price: (Bazakomeza guhakana) kugeza ubwo umwe muri bo agezweho n’urupfu, maze avuge ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Nimungarure (ku isi),
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadahumu al-mawtu qāla rabbi ir'jiʿūni
